atk-abh03a2:3_1: saddhiṁ yojetvā dassetuṁ rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehītiādinā nayena niddesavāro
atk-abh03a2:3_2: āraddho. Tattha yasmā ‘‘saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādikāya nayamātikāya ‘‘tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi
atk-abh03a2:3_3: asaṅgaho’’ti nayamukhamātikā ṭhapitā, tasmā rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ katihi
atk-abh03a2:3_4: khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhīti tīṇi khandhāyatanadhātupadāneva uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a2:3_5: ‘Cattāri saccānī’tiādīsu ekampi na parāmaṭṭhaṁ. Yasmā ca ‘‘sabhāgo visabhāgo’’ti
atk-abh03a2:3_6: evaṁ lakkhaṇamātikā ṭhapitā, tasmā imassa pañhassa vissajjane rūpakkhandho ekena
atk-abh03a2:3_7: khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ. Sabhāgā hi tassa ete khandhādayoti. Tattha ekena khandhenāti
atk-abh03a2:3_8: rūpakkhandheneva. Yañhi kiñci rūpaṁ rūpakkhandhasabhāgattā rūpakkhandhotveva saṅgahaṁ
atk-abh03a2:3_9: gacchatīti rūpakkhandheneva gaṇitaṁ, taṁ rūpakkhandheneva paricchinnaṁ. Ekādasahāyatanehīti
atk-abh03a2:3_10: manāyatanavajjehi. Sabbopi hi rūpakkhandho dasāyatanāni dhammāyatanekadeso ca hoti,
atk-abh03a2:3_11: tasmā ekādasahāyatanehi gaṇito , paricchinno. Ekādasahi dhātūhīti sattaviññāṇadhātuvajjāhi
atk-abh03a2:3_12: ekādasahi etāsu hi apariyāpannaṁ rūpaṁ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:4_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddese katihi asaṅgahitoti saṅkhepeneva pucchā katā. Vissajjane panassa
atk-abh03a2:4_1: yasmā rūpakkhandhassa visabhāgā cattāro arūpakkhandhā, ekaṁ manāyatanaṁ, satta viññāṇadhātuyo;
atk-abh03a2:4_2: tasmā catūhi khandhehītiādi vuttaṁ. Iminā nayena sabbapadesu saṅgahāsaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:4_3: Imasmiṁ pana khandhaniddese – ‘‘rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehī’’tiādimhi tāva ekamūlake
atk-abh03a2:4_4: saṅgahanaye sarūpeneva dassitā pañca pucchā, pañca vissajjanāni. Asaṅgahanaye saṅkhepena
atk-abh03a2:4_5: dassitā pañca pucchā, pañca vissajjanāni. Iminā upāyena dukamūlakādīsupi pucchāvissajjanāni
atk-abh03a2:4_6: veditabbāni. Rūpakkhandhamūlakāyeva cettha dukatikacatukkā dassitā. Pañcake pana
atk-abh03a2:4_7: ‘‘rūpakkhandho ca…pe… viññāṇakkhandho cā’’ti evaṁ bhedato ca, ‘‘pañcakkhandhā katihi
atk-abh03a2:4_8: khandhehī’’ti evaṁ abhedato cāti dvidhā pucchāvissajjanāni katāni. Evaṁ pāḷinayo veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:6_0: 22. Āyatanapadaniddesādīsu āyatanapadaniddese tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ ekena khandhenāti
atk-abh03a2:6_1: ekena rūpakkhandheneva, ekena cakkhāyataneneva ekāya cakkhudhātuyāva saṅgahitanti
atk-abh03a2:6_2: veditabbaṁ. Sotāyatanādīsupi imināva nayena saṅgahāsaṅgaho veditabbo. Asaṅkhataṁ
atk-abh03a2:6_3: khandhato ṭhapetvāti ettha pana yasmā asaṅkhataṁ dhammāyatanaṁ nāma nibbānaṁ, tañca
atk-abh03a2:6_4: khandhasaṅgahaṁ na gacchati; tasmā ‘khandhato ṭhapetvā’ti vuttaṁ. Catūhi khandhehīti
atk-abh03a2:6_6: Viññāṇakkhandhena pana ṭhapetvā dhammāyatanadhammadhātuyo sesāyatanadhātūhi ca taṁ
atk-abh03a2:6_7: na saṅgayhati. Tena vuttaṁ – ‘‘ekena khandhena, ekādasahāyatanehi, sattarasahi dhātūhi
atk-abh03a2:6_8: asaṅgahita’’nti. Yathā ca te heṭṭhā rūpakkhandhamūlakā, evamidhāpi cakkhāyatanamūlakāva
atk-abh03a2:6_9: nayā veditabbā. Dukamattameva pana pāḷiyaṁ dassetvā ‘‘dvādasāyatanānī’’ti abhedatova
atk-abh03a2:7: 40. Saccaniddese – sabbepi dukatikacatukkā pāḷiyaṁ dassitā. Yasmā ca dukatikesu samudayasaccasadisameva maggasaccepi vissajjanaṁ, tasmā taṁ samudayānantaraṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:8_0: 50. Indriyaniddese – jīvitindriyaṁ dvīhi khandhehīti rūpajīvitindriyaṁ rūpakkhandhena,
atk-abh03a2:8_1: arūpajīvitindriyaṁ saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitaṁ. Sesaṁ vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:10_0: 61. Paṭiccasamuppādaniddese – ‘‘avijjā katihi khandhehī’’ti pucchaṁ anārabhitvā avijjā
atk-abh03a2:10_1: ekena khandhenāti evaṁ vissajjanameva dassitaṁ. Tattha saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti
atk-abh03a2:10_2: paṭisandhiyaṁ pavatte ca sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṁ. Tenevāha – ‘‘sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahita’’nti.
atk-abh03a2:10_3: Nāmarūpampi paṭisandhipavattivaseneva veditabbaṁ. Tenevettha saddāyatanampi saṅgahetvā
atk-abh03a2:10_4: ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgaho dassito. Phassādīsu khandhabhedo veditabbo. Aññeneva hi
atk-abh03a2:10_5: ekena khandhena phasso saṅgahito, aññena vedanā, taṇhāupādānakammabhavā pana saṅkhārakkhandheneva
atk-abh03a2:10_6: saṅgahitā. Bhavapadañcettha kammabhavādīnaṁ vasena ekādasadhā vibhattaṁ. Tattha kammabhavo
atk-abh03a2:10_7: phassādīhi sadisavisajjanattā tehi saddhiṁ ekato dassito. Upapattibhavakāmabhavasaññābhavapañcavokārabhavā
atk-abh03a2:10_8: aññamaññasadisavissajjanattā ekato dassitā. Yasmā cete upādinnakadhammāva tasmā ‘‘ekādasahāyatanehi
atk-abh03a2:10_9: sattarasahi dhātūhī’’ti vuttaṁ. Saddāyatanañhi anupādinnaṁ, taṁ ettha na gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:11_2: Arūpabhavādayopi tayo sadisavissajjanattāva ekato dassitā. Tathā asaññābhavaekavokārabhavā.
atk-abh03a2:11_3: Tattha dvīhāyatanehīti rūpāyatanadhammāyatanehi. Dhātūsupi eseva nayo. Ekatalavāsikānañhi
atk-abh03a2:11_4: sesabrahmānaṁ cakkhusabbhāvato tassārammaṇattā tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uddhaṭaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:12_0: 71.Jāti dvīhi khandhehīti rūpajāti rūpakkhandhena, arūpajāti saṅkhārakkhandhena.
atk-abh03a2:12_1: Jarāmaraṇesupi eseva nayo. Sokādīsupi ekena khandhenāti sokadukkhadomanassāni vedanākkhandhena,
atk-abh03a2:12_2: paridevo rūpakkhandhena, upāyāsādayo saṅkhārakkhandhenāti evaṁ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:13_1: ca. Jhānaṁ dvīhīti vedanākkhandhasaṅkhārakkhandhehi. Appamaññādayo sadisavissajjanattā
atk-abh03a2:13_2: ekato niddiṭṭhā. Cittaṁ pana cetanānantaraṁ nikkhittampi asadisavissajjanattā pacchā
atk-abh03a2:13_3: gahitaṁ. Tattha appamaññādīsu ekena khandhenāti vedanā vedanākkhandhena, saññā saññākkhandhena,
atk-abh03a2:13_4: sesā saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitāti evaṁ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:15_0: 77. Evaṁ abbhantaramātikāya saṅgahaṁ dassetvā idāni bāhiramātikāya saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ
atk-abh03a2:15_1: kusalā dhammātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha vedanāttike tīhi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇamanoviññāṇadhammadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:15_3: ca. Vipākattike aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā saddhiṁ tāhiyeva. Vipākadhammadhammā
atk-abh03a2:15_4: pana saṁkiliṭṭhasaṁkilesikehi saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanattā ekato gahitā. Yathā cete,
atk-abh03a2:15_5: evaṁ sabbatikadukapadesu yaṁ yaṁ padaṁ yena yena padena saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanaṁ
atk-abh03a2:15_6: hoti, taṁ taṁ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi tena tena saddhiṁ gahetvā vissajjitaṁ. Tattha vuttānusāreneva
atk-abh03a2:18_0: 171. Idāni saṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ cakkhāyatanenātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tatridaṁ
atk-abh03a2:18_1: lakkhaṇaṁ – imasmiñhi vāre yaṁ khandhapadena saṅgahitaṁ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi
atk-abh03a2:18_2: asaṅgahitaṁ, khandhāyatanapadehi vā saṅgahitaṁ hutvā dhātupadena asaṅgahitaṁ, tassa
atk-abh03a2:18_3: khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ. Taṁ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:18_4: Rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito. So ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito
atk-abh03a2:18_5: nāma natthi. Vedanākkhandhena ca vedanākkhandhova saṅgahito. Sopi dhammāyatanadhammadhātūhi
atk-abh03a2:18_6: asaṅgahito nāma natthi. Evaṁ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni manāyatanadhammāyatanādīni
atk-abh03a2:18_7: padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni rūpekadesaṁ arūpena asammissaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:18_8: viññāṇekadesañca aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Pariyosāne ca –
atk-abh03a2:23_0: Evaṁ uddānagāthāya dassitāneva. Tasmā tesaṁ vaseneva saṅgahāsaṅgaho veditabbo. Pañhavasena
atk-abh03a2:23_1: hi imasmiṁ vāre āyatanadhātuvaseneva sadisavissajjane vīsati dhamme samodhānetvā
atk-abh03a2:23_2: eko pañho kato, satta viññāṇadhātuyo samodhānetvā eko, sattindriyāni samodhānetvā
atk-abh03a2:23_3: eko, dve bhave samodhānetvā eko, paridevena ca sanidassanasappaṭighehi ca eko, anidassanasappaṭighehi
atk-abh03a2:23_4: eko, sanidassanehi eko, sappaṭighehi ca upādādhammehi ca ekoti aṭṭha pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a2:23_5: Tesu khandhādivibhāgo evaṁ veditabbo seyyathidaṁ – paṭhamapañhe tāva catūhi khandhehīti
atk-abh03a2:23_6: arūpakkhandhehi, dvīhāyatanehīti cakkhāyatanādīsu ekekena saddhiṁ manāyatanena, aṭṭhahi
atk-abh03a2:23_7: dhātūhīti cakkhudhātuādīsu ekekāya saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:24_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – cakkhāyatanena hi khandhasaṅgahena rūpakkhandho saṅgahito. Tasmiṁ
atk-abh03a2:24_1: saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe āyatanasaṅgahena cakkhāyatanamevekaṁ saṅgahitaṁ. Sesāni dasa
atk-abh03a2:24_2: āyatanāni asaṅgahitāni. Dhātusaṅgahenapi tena cakkhudhātuyevekā saṅgahitā. Sesā dasa
atk-abh03a2:24_3: dhātuyo asaṅgahitā. Iti yāni tena asaṅgahitāni dasāyatanāni, tāni cakkhāyatanamanāyatanehi
atk-abh03a2:24_4: dvīhi asaṅgahitāni. Yāpi tena asaṅgahitā dasa dhātuyo, tā cakkhudhātuyā ceva sattahi
atk-abh03a2:24_5: ca viññāṇadhātūhi asaṅgahitāti. Rūpāyatanādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:25_0: 172. Dutiyapañhe – yasmā yāya kāyaci viññāṇadhātuyā saṅgahito viññāṇakkhandho manāyatanena
atk-abh03a2:25_1: asaṅgahito nāma natthi, tasmā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitāti vuttaṁ. Ettha pana catūhi
atk-abh03a2:25_2: khandhehīti rūpādīhi catūhi. Ekādasahāyatanehīti manāyatanavajjehi. Dvādasahi dhātūhīti
atk-abh03a2:25_3: yathānurūpā cha viññāṇadhātuyo apanetvā sesāhi dvādasahi. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā hi
atk-abh03a2:25_4: cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyeva saṅgahitā, itarā asaṅgahitā. Sotaviññāṇadhātuādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:26_1: pana dhammāyatanena saddhiṁ dve āyatanāni, dhammadhātuyā ca saddhiṁ aṭṭha dhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:27_0: 174. Catutthapañhe – tīhāyatanehīti rūpāyatanadhammāyatanamanāyatanehi. Tesu hi bhavesu
atk-abh03a2:27_1: rūpāyatanadhammāyatanavasena dveva āyatanāni tehi saṅgahitāni . Sesāni nava rūpāyatanāni
atk-abh03a2:27_2: teheva ca dvīhi, manāyatanena cāti tīhi asaṅgahitāni nāma honti. Navahi dhātūhīti
atk-abh03a2:28_1: Dutiyapadaṁ sandhāya rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi. Dhātuyopi tesaṁyeva ekekena saddhiṁ
atk-abh03a2:29_1: rūpadhātudhammadhātuvajjeheva. Kathaṁ? Anidassanasappaṭighā hi dhammā nāma nava oḷārikāyatanāni.
atk-abh03a2:29_2: Tehi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe, āyatanasaṅgahena tāneva navāyatanāni
atk-abh03a2:29_3: saṅgahitāni. Rūpāyatanadhammāyatanāni asaṅgahitāni. Dhātusaṅgahenapi tā eva nava
atk-abh03a2:29_4: dhātuyo saṅgahitā. Rūpadhātudhammadhātuyo asaṅgahitā. Iti yāni tehi asaṅgahitāni
atk-abh03a2:29_5: dve āyatanāni , tāni rūpāyatanavajjehi navahi oḷārikāyatanehi, manāyatanena cāti
atk-abh03a2:29_6: dasahi asaṅgahitāni. Yāpi tehi asaṅgahitā dve dhātuyo, tā rūpadhātuvajjāhi navahi
atk-abh03a2:29_7: oḷārikadhātūhi, sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti soḷasahi asaṅgahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:30: 177. Sattamapañhe – dvīhāyatanehīti rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi. Aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātuyā saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:31_1: upādādhamme sandhāya phoṭṭhabbāyatanavajjehi. Dhātūsupi eseva nayo. Atthayojanā panettha
atk-abh03a2:34_0: 179. Idāni asaṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ vedanākkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tatridaṁ
atk-abh03a2:34_1: lakkhaṇaṁ – imasmiñhi vāre yaṁ khandhapadena asaṅgahitaṁ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi
atk-abh03a2:34_2: saṅgahitaṁ, tassa khandhādīhi saṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ. Taṁ pana rūpakkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīsu
atk-abh03a2:34_3: na yujjati. Rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Tesu tena
atk-abh03a2:34_4: ekadhammopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi. Nanu ca vedanādayo dhammāyatanena
atk-abh03a2:34_5: saṅgahitāti? Saṅgahitā. Na pana rūpakkhandhova dhammāyatanaṁ, rūpakkhandhato hi sukhumarūpamattaṁ
atk-abh03a2:34_6: dhammāyatanaṁ bhajati. Tasmā ye dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā, na te rūpakkhandhena saṅgahitā
atk-abh03a2:34_7: nāma. Viññāṇakkhandhenapi itare cattāro khandhā asaṅgahitā. Tesu tena ekopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena
atk-abh03a2:34_8: saṅgahito nāma natthi. Evaṁ saṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni cakkhāyatanādīni
atk-abh03a2:34_9: padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni viññāṇena vā oḷārikarūpena vā asammissaṁ
atk-abh03a2:34_10: dhammāyatanekadesaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:35: ‘‘Tayo khandhā tathā saccā, indriyāni ca soḷasa;
atk-abh03a2:39_0: Etesu pana padesu sadisavissajjanāni padāni ekato katvā sabbepi dvādasa pañhā vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:39_1: Tesu evaṁ khandhavibhāgo veditabbo. Āyatanadhātūsu pana bhedo natthi. Tattha paṭhamapañhe
atk-abh03a2:39_2: tāva – tīhi khandhehīti rūpasaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhehi. Āyatanadhātuyo pana dhammāyatanadhammadhātuvasena veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:40_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – vedanākkhandhena hi nibbānañca sukhumarūpasaññāsaṅkhārā ca khandhasaṅgahena
atk-abh03a2:40_1: asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā. Tesu nibbānaṁ khandhasaṅgahaṁ na
atk-abh03a2:40_2: gacchati, sesā rūpasaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhehi saṅgahaṁ gacchanti. Āyatanadhātusaṅgahaṁ
atk-abh03a2:40_3: pana nibbānampi gacchateva. Tena vuttaṁ – ‘‘asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi,
atk-abh03a2:40_4: ekenāyatanena, ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā’’ti. Saññākkhandhapakkhe panettha saññaṁ apanetvā
atk-abh03a2:40_5: vedanāya saddhiṁ tayo khandhā saṅkhārādīsu saṅkhārakkhandhaṁ apanetvā rūpavedanāsaññāvasena
atk-abh03a2:41: 180. Dutiye – catūhi khandhehīti viññāṇavajjehi. Te hi nirodhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:42_0: 181. Tatiye – dvīhīti vedanāsaññākkhandhehi. Rūpārūpajīvitindriyena hi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā
atk-abh03a2:42_1: ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Tesu pana vedanāsaññāva āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:42_2: Tena vuttaṁ – ‘‘vedanāsaññākkhandhehī’’ti. Iminā upāyena sabbattha khandhabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:44_0: 183. Pañcame – jātijarāmaraṇesu jīvitindriyasadisova. Jhānena pana nibbānaṁ sukhumarūpaṁ
atk-abh03a2:44_1: saññā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā. Tasmā
atk-abh03a2:44_2: taṁ sandhāya rūpakkhandhasaññākkhandhānaṁ vasena dve khandhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:45_0: 184. Chaṭṭhe – sokādittaye vedanāya sadiso. Upāyāsādīsu saṅkhārasadiso. Puna vedanāya
atk-abh03a2:45_2: vinicchayo. Iminā upāyena sattamapañhādīsupi saṅgahāsaṅgaho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:48_0: 191. Idāni saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ samudayasaccenātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha
atk-abh03a2:48_1: yaṁ khandhādīhi saṅgahitena khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ, puna tasseva khandhādīhi
atk-abh03a2:48_2: saṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ. Taṁ khandhāyatanadhātūsu ekampi sakalakoṭṭhāsaṁ
atk-abh03a2:48_3: gahetvā ṭhitapadesu na yujjati. Sakalena hi khandhādipadena aññaṁ khandhādivasena
atk-abh03a2:48_4: saṅgahitaṁ nāma natthi, yaṁ attano saṅgāhakaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṁ gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a2:48_5: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni saṅkhārekadesaṁ
atk-abh03a2:48_6: vā aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti – vedanekadesaṁ vā sukhumarūpaṁ vā saddekadesaṁ vā,
atk-abh03a2:51_0: Pañhā panettha dveyeva honti. Tattha yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ, tadeva yehi dhammehi
atk-abh03a2:51_1: khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ, te dhamme sandhāya sabbattha ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:51_2: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – samudayasaccena hi taṇhāvajjā sesā saṅkhārā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:51_3: Puna tehi taṇhāva saṅgahitā. Sā taṇhā puna saṅkhāreheva khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a2:51_4: Eseva nayo sabbattha. Arūpadhammapucchāsu panettha saṅkhārakkhandho vā vedanākkhandho
atk-abh03a2:51_5: vā eko khandho nāma. Rūpadhammapucchāsu rūpakkhandho. Paridevapucchāya saddāyatanaṁ
atk-abh03a2:51_6: ekaṁ āyatanaṁ nāma. Saddadhātu ekā dhātu nāma, sesaṭṭhānesu dhammāyatanadhammadhātuvaseneva attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:54_0: 193. Idāni asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha
atk-abh03a2:54_1: yaṁ khandhādīhi asaṅgahitena khandhādivasena asaṅgahitaṁ, puna tasseva khandhādīhi
atk-abh03a2:54_2: asaṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ. Taṁ pañcakkhandhaggāhakesu dukkhasaccādīsu
atk-abh03a2:54_3: viññāṇena saddhiṁ sukhumarūpaggāhakesu anidassanaappaṭighādīsu ca padesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:54_4: Tādisena hi padena nibbānaṁ khandhasaṅgahamattaṁ na gaccheyya. Sesā khandhādīhi asaṅgahitadhammā
atk-abh03a2:54_5: nāma natthi. Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana pañcakkhandhe
atk-abh03a2:54_6: viññāṇañca sukhumarūpena saddhiṁ ekato na dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:58: Gocchake sattati dve ca, satta cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a2:60: Aṭṭhāraseva ñātabbā, sesā idha na bhāsitā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:61_0: Pañhā panettha sadisavissajjanānaṁ vasena samodhānetvā katihi saddhiṁ sabbepi catuttiṁsa
atk-abh03a2:61_1: honti. Tattha yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ, tadeva yehi khandhādīhi asaṅgahitaṁ, te
atk-abh03a2:62_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā nibbānañca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_1: Āyatanadhātusaṅgahena pana ṭhapetvā viññāṇaṁ avasesā saṅgahitāti viññāṇameva tīhipi
atk-abh03a2:62_2: khandhasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitaṁ nāma. Puna tena viññāṇena saddhiṁ nibbānena cattāro
atk-abh03a2:62_3: khandhā khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Te sabbepi puna viññāṇeneva khandhādisaṅgahena
atk-abh03a2:62_4: asaṅgahitāti ekena khandhena, ekenāyatanena, sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā nāma honti.
atk-abh03a2:62_5: Atha vā – yadetaṁ rūpakkhandhena viññāṇameva tīhi khandhādisaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:62_6: tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā. Puna te rūpadhammā
atk-abh03a2:62_7: viññāṇeneva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā. Viññāṇañca khandhato eko viññāṇakkhandho hoti,
atk-abh03a2:62_8: āyatanato ekaṁ manāyatanaṁ, dhātuto satta viññāṇadhātuyo. Tasmā ‘‘ekena khandhenā’’tiādi
atk-abh03a2:62_9: vuttaṁ. Iminā upāyena sabbattha yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ, tadeva yehi dhammehi
atk-abh03a2:62_10: khandhādivasena asaṅgahitaṁ, tesaṁ dhammānaṁ vasena khandhādayo veditabbā. Tattha
atk-abh03a2:62_11: dutiyapañhe tāva – rūpaviññāṇānaṁ vasena veditabbā. Vedanādayo hi rūpaviññāṇeheva
atk-abh03a2:62_12: khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Te ca dve khandhā ekādasāyatanāni sattarasa dhātuyo honti.
atk-abh03a2:63: 195. Tatiyapañhe – viññāṇaṁ rūpādīhi catūhi asaṅgahitanti tesaṁ vasena khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:64_0: 196. Catutthapañhe – cakkhāyatanaṁ vedanādīhi catūhīti iminā nayena sabbattha khandhādayo
atk-abh03a2:64_1: veditabbā. Pariyosāne – rūpañca dhammāyatananti uddānagāthāya dassitadhammāyeva aññenākārena
atk-abh03a2:67_0: 228. Idāni sampayogavippayogapadaṁ bhājetuṁ rūpakkhandhotiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha yaṁ
atk-abh03a2:67_1: labbhati yañca na labbhati taṁ sabbaṁ pucchāya gahitaṁ. Vissajjane pana yaṁ na labbhati,
atk-abh03a2:67_2: taṁ natthīti paṭikkhittaṁ. Catūhi sampayogo, catūhi vippayogo; sabhāgo visabhāgoti
atk-abh03a2:67_3: hi vacanato catūhi arūpakkhandheheva sabhāgānaṁ ekasantānasmiṁ ekakkhaṇe uppannānaṁ
atk-abh03a2:67_4: arūpakkhandhānaṁyeva aññamaññaṁ sampayogo labbhati. Rūpadhammānaṁ pana rūpena nibbānena
atk-abh03a2:67_5: vā, nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṁ sampayogo nāma natthi. Tathā rūpanibbānānaṁ arūpakkhandhehi,
atk-abh03a2:67_6: visabhāgā hi te tesaṁ. Yathā ca arūpakkhandhānaṁ rūpanibbānehi, evaṁ bhinnasantānehi
atk-abh03a2:67_7: nānākkhaṇikehi arūpadhammehipi saddhiṁ natthiyeva. Tepi hi tesaṁ santānakkhaṇavisabhāgatāya
atk-abh03a2:67_8: visabhāgāyeva. Ayaṁ pana visabhāgatā saṅgahaṭṭhena virujjhanato saṅgahanaye natthi.
atk-abh03a2:67_9: Gaṇanūpagamattañhi saṅgahaṭṭho. Sampayoganaye pana atthi, ekuppādatādilakkhaṇañhi
atk-abh03a2:67_10: sampayogaṭṭhoti. Evamettha yassa ekadhammenapi sampayogalakkhaṇaṁ na yujjhati, tassa
atk-abh03a2:67_11: pucchāya saṅgahaṁ katvāpi natthīti paṭikkhepo kato. Yassa vippayogalakkhaṇaṁ yujjati,
atk-abh03a2:67_12: tassa vippayogo dassito. Yāni pana padāni sattasu viññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutte
atk-abh03a2:67_13: rūpena nibbānena vā missakadhamme dīpenti, tāni sabbathāpi idha na yujjantīti na
atk-abh03a2:71: Gocchakesu ca paññāsa, aṭṭha cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a2:73: Tevīsa padasataṁ etaṁ, sampayoge na labbhatī’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:74_0: Dhammāyatanañhi rūpanibbānamissakattā tasmiṁ apariyāpannena viññāṇenapi na sakkā
atk-abh03a2:74_1: sampayuttanti vattuṁ. Yasmā panettha vedanādayo viññāṇena sampayuttā, tasmā vippayuttantipi
atk-abh03a2:74_2: na sakkā vattuṁ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Evaṁ sabbatthāpi etāni na yujjantīti idha na
atk-abh03a2:74_3: gahitāni. Sesāni khandhādīni yujjantīti tāni gahetvā ekekavasena ca samodhānena ca
atk-abh03a2:74_4: pañhavissajjanaṁ kataṁ. Tesu pañhesu, paṭhame – ekenāyatanenāti manāyatanena. Kehicīti
atk-abh03a2:75_0: 229. Dutiye – tīhīti pucchitaṁ pucchitaṁ ṭhapetvā sesehi. Kehici sampayuttoti vedanākkhandho
atk-abh03a2:75_1: saññāsaṅkhārehi. Itarepi attānaṁ ṭhapetvā itarehi. Kehici vippayuttoti rūpanibbānehi.
atk-abh03a2:75_2: Evaṁ sabbattha rūpassa vippayoge dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu arūpaṁ, arūpassa vippayoge
atk-abh03a2:76_0: 231. Catutthe – ‘katihi khandhehī’tiādiṁ avatvā sampayuttanti natthīti vuttaṁ. Taṁ
atk-abh03a2:76_1: pana khandhādīnaṁyeva vasena veditabbaṁ. Paratopi evarūpesu pañhesu eseva nayo. Ādipañhasmiñhi
atk-abh03a2:76_2: sarūpato dassetvā parato pāḷi saṁkhittā. Iminā nayena sabbattha atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:76_3: Yattha pana nātipākaṭā bhavissati, tattha naṁ pākaṭaṁ katvāva gamissāma.
atk-abh03a2:77: 234.Soḷasahi dhātūhīti cakkhuviññāṇadhātu tāva attānaṁ ṭhapetvā chahi viññāṇadhātūhi, dasahi ca rūpadhātūhi. Sesāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:78_0: 235.Tīhikhandhehīti saṅkhārakkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā sesehi. Ekāya dhātuyāti manoviññāṇadhātuyā.
atk-abh03a2:78_1: Samudayamaggānañhi aññāya dhātuyā sampayogo natthi. Ekena khandhenāti saṅkhārakkhandhena.
atk-abh03a2:78_2: Ekenāyatanenāti dhammāyatanena. Ekāyadhātuyāti dhammadhātuyā. Etesu hi taṁ saccadvayaṁ kehici sampayuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:79: 238. Sukhindriyādipañhe – tīhīti saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇehi. Ekāya dhātuyāti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā, manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca. Chahi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuvajjāhi.
atk-abh03a2:80: 245. Rūpabhavapañhe – sabbesampi arūpakkhandhānaṁ arūpāyatanānañca atthitāya na kehicīti vuttaṁ. Ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūnaṁ pana natthitāya tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttoti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:81: 256. Adhimokkhapañhe – dvīhi dhātūhīti manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūhi. Pannarasahīti sesāhi dasahi rūpadhātūhi, pañcahi ca cakkhuviññāṇādīhi.
atk-abh03a2:82: 257. Kusalapañhe – kusalehi catunnampi khandhānaṁ gahitattā sampayogo paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a2:83_1: ceva rūpadhātūhi ca. Ekādasahīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā saddhiṁ rūpadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:84_2: viññāṇehi saddhiṁ rūpadhātūhi. Avitakkavicāramattapañhe – ekena khandhenātiādi saṅkhārakkhandhavaseneva
atk-abh03a2:84_3: veditabbaṁ. Dutiyajjhānavicārañhi ṭhapetvā sesā avitakkavicāramattā nāma. Pītiṁ ṭhapetvā
atk-abh03a2:84_4: sesā pītisahagatā. Tattha vicāro vicārena, pīti ca pītiyā na sampayuttāti saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu
atk-abh03a2:84_5: kehici sampayuttā nāma. Soḷasahīti dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuvajjāheva. Avitakkaavicārapañhe
atk-abh03a2:84_6: – ekāya dhātuyāti manodhātuyā. Sukhasahagatā upekkhāsahagatā ca vedanāttike vuttāva.
atk-abh03a2:85_1: ye tattha parittārammaṇā na honti, tehi. Dhammadhātu pana parittārammaṇānaṁ channaṁ
atk-abh03a2:85_2: cittuppādānaṁ vasena catūhi khandhehi saṅgahitattā paṭhamapaṭikkhepameva bhajati.
atk-abh03a2:86_0: 273. Anuppannesu – pañcahi dhātūhīti cakkhuviññāṇādīhi. Tāni hi ekantena uppādidhammabhūtāneva,
atk-abh03a2:86_2: Hetuādayo samudayasadisāva. Sahetukā ceva na ca hetūpi pītisahagatasadisāva. Tathā
atk-abh03a2:86_3: parāmāsasampayuttā. Anupādinnā anuppannasadisāva. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a2:89_0: 306. Idāni sampayuttenavippayuttapadaṁ bhājetuṁ vedanākkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tatridaṁ
atk-abh03a2:89_1: lakkhaṇaṁ – imasmiñhi vāre pucchāya uddhaṭapadena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi ye dhammā
atk-abh03a2:89_2: vippayuttā, tesaṁ khandhādīhi vippayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ. Taṁ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu
atk-abh03a2:89_3: na yujjati. Rūpakkhandhena hi sampayuttā nāma natthi. Tasmā tañca aññāni ca evarūpāni
atk-abh03a2:89_4: padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme
atk-abh03a2:89_5: viññāṇañca aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:96_0: Pariyosāne – khandhā caturotiādināpi ayamevattho saṅgahito. Tattha yāni padāni sadisavissajjanāni,
atk-abh03a2:96_1: tāni uppaṭipāṭiyāpi samodhānetvā tattha vedanākkhandhādikā pañhā katā. Tesu evaṁ
atk-abh03a2:96_2: khandhādivibhāgo veditabbo. Vedanākkhandhādipañhe tāva – ekenāti manāyatanena. Sattahīti
atk-abh03a2:96_3: viññāṇadhātūhi. Kehicīti dhammāyatane vedanādīhi. Viññāṇadhātupañhe – te dhammā na
atk-abh03a2:96_4: kehicīti te pucchāya uddhaṭapadaṁ viññāṇadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā sesā cha viññāṇadhātudhammā,
atk-abh03a2:96_5: rūpaṁ, nibbānañca. Tehi sabbesaṁ khandhāyatanānaṁ saṅgahitattā na kehici khandhehi
atk-abh03a2:96_6: āyatanehi vā vippayuttā. Ekāya dhātuyāti yā yā pucchāya uddhaṭā hoti tāya tāya.
atk-abh03a2:97: 309. Upekkhindriyapañhe – pañcahīti upekkhāsampayuttāhi cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīhi. Iminā nayena sabbattha pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṁ vippayuttānaṁ vasena attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:100_0: 317. Idāni vippayuttenasampayuttapadaṁ bhājetuṁ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha
atk-abh03a2:100_1: sabbāpi pucchā moghapucchāva . Rūpakkhandhena hi vippayuttā nāma cattāro khandhā,
atk-abh03a2:100_2: tesaṁ aññehi sampayogo natthi. Vedanākkhandhena vippayuttaṁ rūpaṁ nibbānañca, tassa
atk-abh03a2:100_3: ca kenaci sampayogo natthi. Evaṁ sabbapadesu. Vippayuttānaṁ pana sampayogābhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:100_4: Iti pucchāya moghattā sabbavissajjanesu natthi natthiicceva vuttanti.
atk-abh03a2:103_0: 319. Idāni sampayuttenasampayuttapadaṁ bhājetuṁ vedanākkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha
atk-abh03a2:103_1: yaṁ khandhādivasena sampayuttaṁ, puna tasseva khandhādīhi sampayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ
atk-abh03a2:103_2: kataṁ. Taṁ rūpena vā rūpamissakehi vā sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi vā padehi saddhiṁ
atk-abh03a2:103_3: na yujjati. Rūpena hi rūpamissakena vā aññesaṁ sampayogo natthi. Sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi
atk-abh03a2:103_4: sabbesaṁ sampayogārahānaṁ khandhādīnaṁ gahitattā aññaṁyeva natthi, yaṁ tena saha
atk-abh03a2:103_5: sampayogaṁ gaccheyya. Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni idha na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni
atk-abh03a2:103_6: rūpena asammissaṁ arūpekadesaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:110_0: Sabbapañhesu pana ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭā, te yehi sampayuttā honti, tesaṁ vasena
atk-abh03a2:110_1: khandhādibhedo veditabbo . Vedanākkhandhena hi itare tayo khandhā sampayuttā, puna
atk-abh03a2:110_2: tehi vedanākkhandho sampayutto. So tehi saññādīhi tīhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena,
atk-abh03a2:110_3: sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi, ekasmiṁ dhammāyatane, dhammadhātuyā ca, kehici saññāsaṅkhāreheva
atk-abh03a2:113_0: 353. Idāni vippayuttenavippayuttapadaṁ bhājetuṁ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha
atk-abh03a2:113_1: ye sampayogavippayogapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu teyeva
atk-abh03a2:113_2: uddhaṭā. Sadisavissajjanānaṁ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a2:113_3: Tattha yaṁ padaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ, taṁ yehi dhammehi vippayuttaṁ, tesaṁ vasena khandhādivibhāgo
atk-abh03a2:113_4: veditabbo. Rūpakkhandhena hi vedanādayo vippayuttā, tehi ca rūpakkhandho vippayutto.
atk-abh03a2:113_5: Nibbānaṁ pana sukhumarūpagatikameva. So rūpakkhandho catūhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena
atk-abh03a2:113_6: sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi, dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu, kehici vedanādīhi dhammeheva vippayutto.
atk-abh03a2:116_1: Tattha ye saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese samudayasaccādayova dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu
atk-abh03a2:116_2: teyeva uddhaṭā. Sadisavissajjanānaṁ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh03a2:116_3: āgatāni. Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā, tesaṁ
atk-abh03a2:116_4: yehi sampayogo vā vippayogo vā hoti, tesaṁ vasena khandhādivibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:117_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – samudayasaccena tāva saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā dhammā khandhādisaṅgahena
atk-abh03a2:117_1: saṅgahitā. Te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena, sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi,
atk-abh03a2:117_2: saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇhaṁ sesehi sampayuttattā
atk-abh03a2:117_3: kehici sampayuttā nāma. Ekena pana rūpakkhandhena, dasahi rūpāyatanehi, rūpadhātūhi
atk-abh03a2:117_4: ca vippayuttā, ekasmiṁ dhammāyatane dhammadhātuyā ca, rūpanibbānehi vippayuttattā
atk-abh03a2:117_5: kehici vippayuttā nāma. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:120_1: Tattha ye sampayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese vedanākkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu
atk-abh03a2:120_2: teyeva uddhaṭā. Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttā, tesaṁ yehi saṅgaho
atk-abh03a2:120_3: vā asaṅgaho vā hoti, tesaṁ vasena khandhādibhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:121_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – vedanākkhandho hi saññādīhi sampayutto. Te saññādayo tīhi saññādikkhandhehi,
atk-abh03a2:121_1: dvīhi dhammāyatanamanāyatanehi, dhammadhātuyā ceva, sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti aṭṭhahi
atk-abh03a2:121_2: dhātūhi saṅgahitā, sesāhi khandhāyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahitā. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:124_1: Tattha ye pañcame asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā,
atk-abh03a2:124_2: ye ca arūpabhavena sadisā, teyeva uddhaṭā. Sesā pana na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā. Vedanākkhandhena
atk-abh03a2:124_3: hi khandhādivasena pana rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti. Tesañca sampayogo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:124_4: Tasmā yāni padāni ruhanti, tāneva sadisavissajjanehi saddhiṁ samodhānetvā uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a2:124_5: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭadhammehi khandhādivasena asaṅgahitā, te yehi sampayuttā
atk-abh03a2:124_6: ca vippayuttā ca, tesaṁ vasena khandhādivibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:125_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – rūpakkhandhena tāva viññāṇameva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ. Taṁ vedanādīhi
atk-abh03a2:125_1: tīhi khandhehi, dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca vedanādīheva sampayuttaṁ. Ekena rūpakkhandhena,
atk-abh03a2:125_2: dasahi rūpāyatanarūpadhātūhi, dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca rūpanibbānadhammehi vippayuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:125_3: Taṁ sandhāya te dhammā tīhi khandhehītiādi vuttaṁ. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:128_1: Tattha yesaṁ padānaṁ vippayogo na ruhati, tāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni. Kāni pana
atk-abh03a2:128_2: tānīti? Dhammāyatanādīni. Dhammāyatanassa hi khandhādīsu ekenāpi vippayogo na ruhati.
atk-abh03a2:134: Cha padāni tato uddhaṁ sabbānipi samāsato;
atk-abh03a2:135: Padāni ca na labbhanti, cattālīsañca satta cā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:136_0: Pariyosāne ca – dhammāyatanaṁ dhammadhātūti gāthāpi imamevatthaṁ dīpetuṁ vuttā. Imāni
atk-abh03a2:136_1: pana ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi labbhanti. Tesu khandhādivibhāgo vuttanayānusāreneva veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:143: Ñātuṁ sabbepi nayā, saṅkhepakathāva iti vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:144: Ekekassa pana sace, padassa vitthārameva bhāseyyaṁ;
atk-abh03a2:145: Vacanañca ativiya bahuṁ, bhaveyya attho ca aviseso.
atk-abh03a2:146: Iti ūnabhāṇavāradvayāya, yaṁ tantiyā mayā etaṁ;
atk-abh03a2:147: Kurunā pattaṁ puññaṁ, sukhāya taṁ hotu lokassāti.
